Message:
Hesitantly opening our eyes,
we saw that the syrup in the pot
had begun to sparkle,
just like a gemstone.

Our two lights came together
to make it—our candy!”

It’s so pretty...
And it drips just like honey,
as if we melted
an aurora from the sky...

Ah, oh no!
I have to hurry
and cool it down...!

I then scooped up
all of the sparkling syrup
and poured it out on a tray.

“All we have to do now
is let it cool,
and it’ll be done.

Oh, right...
I should clean up the kitchen
while we wait.
You can take a break,
Cerberus...”

“Cooking, cleaning...
everything’s better
when we do it together,
Big Sis!”
